name: erddap.dataexplorer.oceanobservatories.org erddap
description: ERDDAP data server hosted by Ocean Observatories Initiative (OOI), providing access to scientific datasets, primarily oceanographic and environmental data. The main interface is a list of datasets with OPeNDAP, file downloads, and metadata capabilities. Dataset types cover time series, gridded, and tabular data related to ocean properties, with no commercial or governmental ownership info explicit on the main page.
